definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
Heaven is not cooperating (idiom)/the weather is not favorable for the planned activity
Heaven is cooperating (idiom)/the weather is favorable for the planned activity (a variation of 天公不作美|天公不作美[tian1 gong1 bu4 zuo4 mei3])

sentences.english: Salvage operations have been greatly assisted by the good weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 天公作美，这大大促进了救援行动的顺利进行。

sentences.english: If it rains, walk in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 如果天公做美，还可以在雨中漫步。

sentences.english: But unfortunately, it was a cloudy and windy day.
sentences.chinese: 但天公不作美，清晨时阴天，而且刮起大风。

sentences.english: Jingtian & Gongcheng did not respond to requests for comment by press time.
sentences.chinese: 截至发稿时间，竞天公诚为对置评请求作出回应。

sentences.english: Just hark to local guide, today is a fine day, the weather will be cooperative.
sentences.chinese: 听导游说，今天是个好的天，真是天公作美。

sentences.english: God really Buzuo Mei, but why the wind blowing today, doors and windows kept ringing.
sentences.chinese: 天公真不作美，偏偏今天刮起了风，门窗不停地响。

sentences.english: The ninth September day, the weather, sunny.
sentences.chinese: 九月初九这天，天公作美，阳光和煦。

sentences.english: My plans were thwarted by the weather.
sentences.chinese: 天公不作美，我的计划成泡影。

sentences.english: Providence have make me a lady after a fashion.
sentences.chinese: 天公终于勉强把我造成一位贵妇人。

sentences.english: Weather permitting, we’ll go for an outing this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 如果天公作美，周末我们就去郊游。

definition: the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
Lord of the East, the sun God of Chinese mythology
